#summary How to install/use/configure QuahkeConsole
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy,console,terminal,rxvt,cygwin,cmd,quake,tilda

= Installation =
 * Download the latest version of QuahkeConsole http://code.google.com/p/quahke-console/downloads/list
 * Unzip

= Use =
 * Run QuahkeConsole.exe and start with F1 shortcut
 * a new icon is placed in system tray
 * right click to show the menu
{{{
  About
  Reload .ini file
  Edit .ini file
  Create/Save .ini file
  Suspend Hotkeys
  Pause Script
  Exit
}}}
 * Of course if you want use rxvt you have to install [http://www.cygwin.com Cygwin] with the package rxvt (example of settings in [UserGuide#rxvt])

= Configuration =
 * Create the .ini file (default value are for Windows XP, cmd and 8x12 font)
 * Edit it

=== Section Position ===
|| *Name* || *About* || *Default* ||
|| PosX || Position in X of the console window, left of screen = 0 || -5 ||
|| PosY || Position in Y of the console window, top of screen = 0 || -25 ||
|| OffsetX || Width of the right decoration of the console window || 2 ||
|| OffsetY || Height of the bottom decoration of the console window || 6 ||

=== Section Size ===
|| *Name* || *About* ||
|| SizePercentX || Width of the console in percent of screen || 100 ||
|| SizePercentY || Height of the console in percent of screen || 30 ||

=== Section Font ===
|| *Name* || *About* ||
|| TerminalFont || Font to be used in the console (only rxvt || Terminal-8 ||
|| CharacterSizeX || Font width used in the console || 8 ||
|| CharacterSizeY || Font height used in the console || 12 ||

=== Section Terminal ===
|| *Name* || *About* ||
|| *TerminalType* || Type of terminal you want, only *rxvt* or *cmd* || cmd ||
|| TerminalTitle || Title of the console window || QuahkeConsole ||

=== Section Display ===
|| *Name* || *About* ||
|| TerminalAlpha || Value of the transparency of the console window in percent || 80 ||
|| TerminalForeground || Color of the foreground of the terminal (only rxvt || white ||
|| TerminalBackground || Color of the background of the terminal (only rxvt || black ||
|| TerminalSlideTime || Time to show or hide the console window || 250 ||
|| TerminalSlideTau || Constant time to configure the animation (first order filter || 70 ||

=== Section Misc ===
|| *Name* || *About* ||
|| TerminalShell || Shell you want used in the terminal window (only rxvt || bash ||
|| TerminalHistory || Number of lines to be keep in memory (only rxvt || 5000 ||
|| CygwinPath || Path of the cygwin installation (only rxvt || C:\cygwin ||

= rxvt =
Example of settings for rxvt:
 * In the QuahkeConsole.ini file:
{{{
  [Position]
  PosX=-5
  PosY=-25
  OffsetX=2
  OffsetY=6
  [Size]
  SizePercentX=100
  SizePercentY=20
  [Font]
  TerminalFont=ProggyTinySZ-6
  CharacterSizeX=6
  CharacterSizeY=8
  [Terminal]
  TerminalType=rxvt
  TerminalTitle=QuahkeConsole
  [Display]
  TerminalAlpha=80
  TerminalForeground=white
  TerminalBackground=black
  TerminalSlideTime=100
  TerminalSlideTau=30
  [Misc]
  TerminalShell=zsh
  TerminalHistory=10000
  CygwinPath=D:\cygwin
}}}
 * In the .Xdefaults file from the cygwin home:
{{{
  Rxvt*background:   #000000
  Rxvt*foreground:   #ffffff
  Rxvt*cursorColor:  #d8d8d8
  Rxvt*colorBD:      lightyellow
  Rxvt*colorUL:      yellow
  Rxvt*reverseVideo: false
  Rxvt*scrollBar:    false
  Rxvt*keysym.Home:  \033[1~
  Rxvt*keysym.End:   \033[4~
  rxvt*loginShell:   true
  Rxvt*tintColor:    #dfdfdf
  !! black
  Rxvt*color0:       #676767
  Rxvt*color8:       #757575
  !! red
  Rxvt*color1:       #EA6868
  Rxvt*color9:       #FF7272
  !! green
  Rxvt*color2:       #ABCB8D
  Rxvt*color10:      #AFD78A
  !! yellow
  !Rxvt*color3:       #E8AE5B
  Rxvt*color11:      #FFA75D
  !! blue
  Rxvt*color4:       #71C5F4
  Rxvt*color12:      #67CDE9
  !! magenta
  Rxvt*color5:       #E2BAF1
  Rxvt*color13:      #ECAEE9
  !! cyan
  Rxvt*color6:       #21F1EA
  Rxvt*color14:      #36FFFC
  !! white
  Rxvt*color7:       #F1F1F1
  Rxvt*color15:      #FFFFFF
}}}
